Description¶

Installation¶

Just install package using pip

pip install ipfml

How to use ?¶

To use, simply do :

from PIL import Image
from ipfml.processing import transform
img = Image.open('path/to/image.png')
s = transform.get_LAB_L_SVD_s(img)
